header.gameNote: CONTINENTAL TIRE LAS VEGAS HOLIDAY INVITATIONAL - CAMPUS GAME

videos.description: Nevada's Jordan Caroline drives down the lane and throws down the one-handed alley-oop dunk.
videos.headline: Caroline flies and destroys the rim

videos.description: Nevada's Cody Martin collects the steal and flips it to Jordan Caroline who goes one way, then goes the other for the aerial lay-in.
videos.headline: Caroline gives defender the ookie doke and lays it in

videos.description: Little Rock's Markquis Nowell drives and floats it up, but Caleb Martin is there to swat it into the stands.
videos.headline: Martin blocks it into the stands

videos.description: Nevada's Cody Martin blocks Little Rock's attempt and Caleb Martin drives and scores on a beautiful baseline reverse layup high off the glass.
videos.headline: Nevada D leads to Martin layup
